mapper.select: SELECT CEIL(COUNT(arch_no)/20) AS pages FROM archive

SELECT a.*, m.name, f.file_oriname, f.file_newname, f.file_size FROM archive a LEFT OUTER JOIN member m ON a.member_no = m.member_no LEFT OUTER JOIN file f ON f.file_location ='s' AND f.file_unique_no = a.arch_no WHERE a.arch_state = '0' ORDER BY a.arch_no DESC LIMIT 20 OFFSET #{param1}
SELECT depart_name from department where depart_no = (select depart_p_no from department where depart_no= (select depart_no from member where member_no=#{param1}))
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO file(file_location, file_unique_no, file_oriname, file_newname, file_size, file_state) VALUES("s", #{param3}, #{param1},#{param2},#{param4},"0")
mapper.update: UPDATE archive SET arch_state=1 WHERE arch_no=#{param1}
